review_text: Great place to stay! Clean and comfortable, had everything we needed for the weekend. Great hosts, highly recommend!

We were very pleased with the place and with Somer as a host.
A very nicely decorated studio. There is everything you need and it was very clean. Can only recommend it. We will be happy to come back.

Rodney was a great host. The accommodations were clean and appeared newly built or extensively remodeled. Heating/AC was guest controlled for every room. Kitchen was fully stocked. Close proximity to the park was a huge plus since we were traveling with a toddler. It was easy to get into downtown with just a short drive. The only drawback was the driveway. We had an oversized vehicle that was a bit of a tight squeeze.
Great place, exactly as advertised.
Rodney is a great host. The space has comfortable beds and the kitchen is well supplied.
This was our second stay here with our two young boys, and we loved it. Very clean, very family friendly, beautiful finishes, quiet. We’ll be back!
Such a beautiful Airbnb with good amenities. Looked exactly like the photos and was in a good location. Would definitely recommend Rodney’s place if you’re visiting Bend!

We had a wonderful stay at Sound Smith Guesthouse with our two young kids. The space is very clean and has a wonderful layout with lots of light. The location next to the park and just a few minutes from downtown was perfect for our family. Rodney and Shannon were very kind and welcoming. We would love to stay here again.
The visit was nice. Parking was awkward. No TV unless you stream and bring your own keurig. On a fairly busy street. Nice close walking path.

Such a great place to stay as a family of four in Bend! Rodney's home is away from the main property allowing for plenty of privacy. We did see the owners a few times throughout our stay, and every time, they were pleasant and welcoming and gracious. We would absolutely recommend this place for others who want to visit Bend: it's in a really convenient spot, the kitchen was great for cooking meals, and it was just a fantastic experience!

It was perfect and
the hosts were great!
We will definitely book again if we are in the area.
Very clean unit and had everything we needed. Comfortable living area, well stocked kitchen and great having a bathroom for each bedroom.

We had a medical emergency with one of our parents. Rodney was super helpful and turned the lights and heat on for us as we spent most of our time at St. Charles Hospital. It was a nice oasis for rest. Thank you 😊
The host were very accommodating to my needs. They are friendly and were very kind.

This one was hard for my family and I. My elderly mother visited myself and granddaughter here in Bend. It happened to have a rare ice and snow weather pattern that occurred a couple of days prior to our arrival. Rodney messaged me some hours earlier in the day to inquire about my vehicle to prepare for the arrival and possible struggles to get up his hill and up stairs to place we would be staying. Unfortunately getting up and down to the unit made this trip and visit very frustrating for us. My mother almost slipped twice (even with trying to hold her hand throughout) while trying to get up a hill that a viable path was not provided for us. My 8 year old granddaughter and I had to manually stomp through ice and snow uphill to get to the guest house. It was quite scary and I am thankful we didn’t fall and hurt ourselves. Rodney was outside and communicative with us and did express sympathies for us, which was appreciated, but we wish he had done to plow a path for us.
Absolutely spectacular stay. This stay was exactly what we were looking for during our weekend ski trip. I would definitely rebook for another trip to Bend.
We loved our stay! Thank you!
Wow, Rodney's space is all I'd hoped for and more! It was comfortable, extremely clean, excellent layout, all amenities... I could go on and on! We had a wonderful stay and I would highly recommend!
We loved the light open space- very roomy!

This was a beautiful space and perfect for our family ( we have a toddler), as it is adjacent to a beautiful park and equipped for kids. Rodney was very communicative and accommodating to ensure that our stay was a good one.
Great place to stay and walking distance from a huge park. Lots to do around the area. Rodney was so communicative, friendly, and helpful. We would absolutely stay here again.
We had nice stay, very private, good location
The place was great! I would certainly stay again.
Rodney, is a super helpful and kind host. We were grateful for the hospitality!
Beautiful place, beautiful nearby park, nice neighborhoods to walk through. Very comfortable, enjoyable stay.
We had a great stay at Rodney's airbnb! Clean, modern, cute design. It was a great set up with living and kitchen in between bedrooms giving a lot of privacy!
Extremely clean and comfortable. Open floor plan, lots of natural light and a great home base for daily adventures.
We really enjoyed our stay. The place is brand new, well laid out, private and quiet. Loved being close to larkspur trail.
We had a great stay. Great location and close to everything we needed. Very friendly and helpful.
Very clean and nice…

This place will forever hold a sweet spot for my family of 4. It was just the right size and provided for all of our needs. Most importantly it was the center point of all the activities and adventures we wanted to have! The hosts were friendly and easy communicate with.
My family stayed here for 5 nights in the heat of summer; glad to have a break from the heat with an ac unit in each room and ice cream in the freezer! The nights were comfortable too and got even more so when my husband found that he preferred the bottom bunk mattress, I was good on the mattress in the other room. Although there are no blackout shades and the space is near a busy road, it was quiet at night and we were able to wake up with the birds and start our days! This place was close to everything we wanted to do while visiting: family, parks (just outside of earshot and out the back yard gate!), local pools, lava tube, river float, rocks, food, & sun!
Would LOVE to stay again, maybe in a different season!
Great place! It was very comfortable and close to trails, shopping and restaurants

This place was great. It was comfortable and bright in a convenient location. Best equipped kitchen I've ever seen in an Airbnb. Host is responsive and helpful. Laundry is available in the building. And best of all, it was super clean.

We had a great time and it was a very comfortable space for two couples. Kitchen had enough housewares to cook all of our meals. The park out the back gate was nice to walk in and the trails were fun to explore. Rodney was very helpful and easy to communicate with. The location was close to downtown and the Old Mill district! We will definitely be back!
Rodney was a super host! he fixed any issues we had immediately and even helped our guest fix her tail light. The house was exactly as described and they even had board games we enjoyed very much!

Everything was up to date and spotless. The unit was well equipped , spacious and comfortable we especially likes having 2 bedrooms at opposite ends of the unit with 2 bathrooms
The location made it easy to get downtown and various other places. Rodney and his family are welcoming and helpful
We enjoyed our stay in Bend and felt comfortable in this private unit. Great job Rodney

This AUD with it’s clean and beautiful Scandinavian interior was perfect for our recent stay in Bend. The property is located right next to a park with great playgrounds and beautiful trails, furthermore the proximity to various fields and easy highway access and close to Old Mill District (driving) made it incredibly convenient for us, as we were in town for a sports tournament. The family who hosted were exceptionally kind and accommodating making us feel welcome throughout our entire stay. We would recommend this place and would gladly return.

Rodney was an excellent host! He was responsive to our inquiries about the Bend area and the AirBNB specifically. The guesthouse is immaculate, beautifully cared for, comfortably furnished, and full of light. It's also ideally located next to a park and walking trails through Bend. We would highly recommend it to anyone.
Rodney, was a great host. Everything was as described.
Great location right in bend! Very clean, nice kitchen and comfy beds. Friendly, accommodating hosts. Highly recommend if you’re in Bend.
Great spot! My fam stayed at Rodney’s place for a weekend visiting the in-laws and would definitely stay there again. 10/10 no notes!
thank you rodney for letting us stay in your wonderful home!
Everything was wonderful! It’s such a lovely place and we felt at home! We would definitely stay there again and highly recommend it!
Really nice place, everything we needed and all kept and appointed. would stay here again!

I have stayed in several Airbnbs in Bend and all were nice but this is my favorite. The apartment was fantastic. I appreciated how simple and uncluttered it was with comfortable furniture/bed. The entire place was extremely clean.
Directions for check in/out were very clear. I arrived late at night and had no trouble finding and getting into the apartment. They provided a list of suggested things to do and favorite restaurants. It was nice to have access to a washer and dryer as I stayed a little over a week. I also appreciated the kitchen set-up and appliances, cooking several meals there.
The location was a short drive to most of the things we wanted to see and do in Bend. Definitely a place I would stay again!

We loved staying at Rodney’s home! Great location, quiet neighborhood and friendly home space. It’s very accommodating for kids. Park and community center was less than a 5min walk. The location is central to grocery shops, breweries, and other activities. The space its self was clean and refreshing. I did wish there was more toddler amenities, but did not take away from the at home feeling. I loved that the host was very kind and responsive. My family and I will be staying here again.

I booked this stay for my family and they really enjoyed their stay. It had everything they needed and the hosts were very friendly and helpful. Their stay was comfortable and they enjoyed the walking paths nearby.
Comfortable, private , nice interior design for this accommodation. Well equipped kitchen and bathrooms.

Wow!! Impressed through and through with this property and the host family. The home is private, quiet, comfortable, and cozy. It was the perfect space for getting around Bend during a work trip. I especially loved the gas fireplace on cool mornings and snowy evenings! Rodney and his wife are very generous, the home spares no detail, and communication was quick and kind. This is a gem in Bend!

This place was perfect for our family of four. We appreciated the kids’ books, well stocked kitchen, beautiful finishes and super clean space. And it has a really fun playground a few steps from the backyard. It was great! Can’t wait to come back again.
Wonderful experience. The place was super clean, comfortable bed and a relaxing atmosphere, and super close to everything in Bend as well. 5 out of 5!

We really enjoyed our stay at Rodney's place. The place was so comfortable and clean. We cooked in the well stocked kitchen and the deep soaker bath was just lovely to warm up after being outside in the cool Autumn days. We were able to securely store our mountain bikes which was key for us too. Rodney and Shannon were so kind and easy to communicate with. If in Bend again, we'd go back and stay there again. *Friendly reminder to really check a place one more time after you leave, as I forgot something*
Clean and comfortable, beautiful instruments, close to the river with access to the Larkspur trail that goes all the way to Pilot Butte, a great little walk in the morning or evening.

The space was even more beautiful and spacious than depicted in the photos. The location was close to all of our activities in Bend (including a concert at the amphitheater). And our hosts were friendly and attentive to our communications. When we visit Bend again, we hope to book this space.

Had a really great stay. Everything was new and super clean. We liked the location and the interactions with the hosts (onsite and Shannon was responsive via text). A top Airbnb pick for us when we return to Bend!

We had a great time at Rodney's place in Bend. The apartment had everything we needed and the host family were very friendly. Communication was great and they even went out and bought an electric tea kettle after we asked about one. We would happily stay with Rodney and his family again!
Really nice clean home with terrific, friendly hosts!
Was perfect for our needs.
Clean, contemporary, well laid-out. Private. Great hosts. Convenient location for anything that brings you to Bend.

This is a wonderful space that is close to all the major downtown Bend attractions. The hosts are friendly and interested in you having a good stay. The kitchen is well appointed and the a/c works great. The bedrooms are quite light in the mornings so bring eye masks if this bugs you. Also the traffic noise is somewhat loud in the mornings so ear plugs if you are sensitive to this. Other than that this is a great place to stay!
This place is so nice! The host is really friendly and communicates well! We hope to stay again next time we come back to bend.

Rodney's place was sparkling clean. The ambience was perfect. This was one of our most comfortable stays. All the ammenities were new and functioning well. Located near all the places we wanted to go on our vacation. Rodney was very accommodating to all our family's needs. I would highly recommend.

We really enjoyed our stay here. The place was extremely clean, brand new, and had a very nice layout. You are close to parks and dining as well as hiking trails and anything else you might want to do in Bend. We will definitely look to stay here again next time we are back in town.
Quaint, cozy, would definitely recommend.
Would highly recommend Rodney and family’s place. It was top-notch across the board from check-in and cleanliness, to amenities and location. Super cute and well worth it!
Great host! Brand new place. Next to a park. 110 plug EVs can use. Road noise but it dies down at night.
Perfect quiet retreat, walking distance to Sun River’s Village and trails.

We loved the “wine down” theme. Janel’s place was cozy, comfortable and squeaky clean with numerous thoughtful amenities — even charge stations for watches and phones! Our stay was short yet very comfortable and enjoyable.
easy check-in, super cute place, and good communication.
Everything felt new and very clean. Spacious home and nice neighborhood.
We really enjoyed having plenty of space, the cleanliness, and the peaceful neighborhood. We were about 10-30 minutes away from everywhere we went. We would definitely stay here again!
Quiet street, great walking paths behind the house. Plenty of space, wonderfully clean and very functional.
Great place at a great cost. No complaints and it’s not too far from downtown/old bend.
House was clean and EV charger worked great. Thanks.

It is rare to find an Airbnb that is Dog friendly + has an EV charger, and this place delivered. Very well appointed with a fully stocked kitchen, comfortable bed, and functional furniture. Safe neighborhood and a quick drive into town. We ran into a housekeeping issue but Dean was responsive and took care of it for us, which was greatly appreciated.

Dean’s house is clean, comfortable and tastefully decorated. The kitchen is supplied with all kinds of gadgets, plenty of pots and pans as well as plates, cups for easy food prep for our group.
We love sitting in the dining room/ living area, playing games and having meals.
Beds are really comfortable; We slept really well.
It’s located within 2 minutes from a local high school where our teenagers got to use the tennis court to play pickle ball and tennis.
This house is one of the highlights from our Bend trip. Highly recommend!!
Very quiet neighborhood at the end of a cul-de-sac. Great patio to sit and enjoy a nice book or grill dinner at home.
Great stay, everything felt new and clean. Kitchen really well stocked. Loved all the windows, really nice view of the hillside behind the house.

Newer very well-appointed home. Kitchen especially well-stocked. Comfortable beds and furniture. Had a really nice stay. Particularly nice if you have a dog since there is a park-like open space off the backyard with some trails. EV charger also a plus. Had a couple of hiccups that the host addressed promptly and fairly. Would definitely stay again.
This was a great Airbnb! The kitchen was fully stocked, the beds had cotton sheets, it had comfortable furniture and the overall energy was very peaceful and welcoming. We felt right at home!

I had a fantastic 5-star experience at this Airbnb. The bed was incredibly comfortable, and the host was amazing—very responsive and accommodating. The kitchen was impressively well-equipped with high-end items, and the location was perfect. Highly recommend!
Everything was absolutely perfect. Very easy to check in and out with very minimal effort! Cant wait for my return!

Wonderful, clean home in a convenient location. Loved having the ability to charge our electric vehicle while staying at the property. We had a number of deer hanging out around the home while we relaxed after a day of skiing. Only ~35 minutes to Mt. Bachelor and 10 mins from central Bend. We loved our stay so much we extended for an additional night.
Beautiful home with all of the amenities. Great quiet location with really nice green space behind the home.
The stay was easy and comfortable.
We had a great time on our family vacation. The place was a great location and not too far from downtown. Plenty of space and very comfortable home.

House was spacious and very beautiful inside! From checking in to checking out was so easy! Has everything you need! Great location close to everything but still quiet enough neighborhood where you can still feel like you’re not being disturbed. Recommend everyone to stay here if they come to Bend.
Awesome, clean, well stocked place! Highly recommend!

What’s not to like about this house! The location was great, it was well kept and clean when we arrived. We enjoyed being able to take walks in the snow in the large space behind the house. Beds were comfy and living room and kitchen space was great for hanging, playing games and eating meals. We would definitely stay here again!

This is a great house, very big and comfortable.
Beds were great, kitchen fully equipped. Clean.
Wonderful stay, hope to go back sometime soon ;)
House was great and very well stocked everything we needed. Close to the old mill district with lots to do. Nice walk in the subdivision with the kids. Would defiantly stay again.
Perfect place! Modern, clean and homey. Perfect for a family. Would happily stay here again.
Lovely home, enjoyed our stay quite a bit.

This home was perfect for what we needed. Home is super clean and stocked with everything. Large windows, cozy fireplace and a great location! King sized master has the best mattress and high end linens. One of our favorite Airbnbs! We will be back!
Great house! Plenty of room to hang out and cook. Comfortable bedrooms and great location. Definitely would stay here again!
Great spot to stay with a few friends or a family!

We came over for my nieces volleyball tournament and we’re looking for a clean cozy place to stay in Bend. Deans house was immaculate, beautifully decorated, cozy and perfect for our family. I would highly recommend staying here for a luxurious home away from home feel with all of the amenities to make your stay comfortable.

Nice place, well supplied with staples and most everything for cooking (they provided coffee so no grinder on hand -not a big issue). A little out of town but that made it a quieter stay. We would stay again. Good place.

Very pleased with the house as a family getaway. The neighborhood is very quiet.
Pricing, fees, and instructions are all in synch and matched the home.
It was an easy place to stay.
Thank you. Planning to return for ski season.
Fantastic vacation spot, exactly as pictured and close to all we wanted to do in Bend!
The kitchen was so very well stocked with everyhing we needed, other than groceries. Also appreciated how clean it was. Excellent place for our get-together with our son who just moved to Bend.
Home was in a nice quiet neighborhood close to everything. Beautiful home with a cozy feel. Comfortable beds, and nice upgrades.

Dean’s place was great! It backs up onto a beautiful preserve so we were able to take our pups out for a walk every morning. The location is easily accessible to all of Bend’s local hotspots. The place was super clean and well maintained. I loved the balcony too, great spot to have coffee in the morning. The host was also responsive when we had a question about how to turn on the thermostat. Overall, I would recommend this Airbnb to others.
Beautiful home! Worked perfectly for our weekend stay in Bend! Even the neighbor welcomed us! Host was very friendly and prompt! Thank you for your hospitality!
Great house, had everything we possibly needed. Would 100% stay there again!
Clean and well equipped home. Quiet neighborhood with convenient access to downtown and outdoors.
Nice, spacious and super comfortable. Would definitely stay again!

This home was the perfect home base while we traversed around Bend and the surrounding areas. Having TVs in each room was a real bonus during our downtime. Our favorite part of the home was the deck, where you could enjoy morning sun OR shade, and afternoon shade while drinking coffee or just visiting.
Hosts were responsive to our inquiries upon check-in.

Our stay in this home was perfect! For two full weeks in Bend, we were so glad to have this house. Our family of five was very comfortable; it was spacious and close to parks and trails. The kitchen was the best stocked kitchen of any rental home we’ve stayed in. We loved watching the stars off the deck late at night. Extremely clean, extremely comfortable and modern. Leaving the best impression we’re the hosts who were very accommodating when I realized I had mixed up traveling dates. Overall great experience!

Beautiful home! Crate and Barrel dishes and linens. Top of the line everything including pantry items for use.
Great home!
Nice neighborhood, easy to locate.
Fantastic stay! Good location to everything Bend has to offer.

Then home was perfect for the trip we had planned. It is newer home in a quiet neighborhood. The furnishings were lovely and perfect for the amount of guests. The kitchen was outfitted nicely. The deck was spacious and perfect for the entire family’s BBQ and backs up to open space.

This is a beautiful home! You can expect great communication from your hosts here. We had a small mishap, and the matter was handled immediately without question. Your close to restaurants, and many activities staying at this location. We will stay again!
Clean, spacious, great location, lots of amenities. Overall a terrific stay and wonderful host!
Place was beautiful, comfortable and exactly what we needed for the time we were there. Would stay for sure again

A great place to stay just outside of Bend in a quiet neighborhood. The house is large and very accommodating while being comfortably laid out with lots of amenities.
My family and I really enjoyed our weekend stay here and would definitely recommend it!
Great for families, and near an awesome park!
Awesome place, quiet neighborhood great to relax and enjoy the town
Loved it!
It was a great stay, and I would definitely love to stay here again!
Beautiful home!

The SweatPea Home was perfect for our ski getaway. It was well stocked with all the amenities you needed and then even more that you wouldn't necessarily expect to find in and Airbnb. The house was spacious, comfortable and provided us with all the comforts of "home". Andrew was incredibly responsive with questions and friendly from before out stay up until we departed. The location was a bit out of town but after a full day, it was nice to unwind in a quiet comfortable home. We would 't have wanted it any other way.
Great place to stay. House is clean and pet friendly. Location is convenient and restaurant recommendations are amazing!
This place was so beautiful! My friends and I truly enjoyed our time here. It was perfect for our winter getaway and it had everything we needed!

Andrew was totally proactive in every way and a great host, place was immaculate, well described, good location in relation to the downtown area, but still in quiet surroundings, would stay there again... Thanks!!

This place was just what we needed for our stay. Andrew had everything we needed to prep meals and feel at home. Out the back door is an undeveloped area that is very convenient for exercising the dogs! Comfortable beds and linens, and a tv in every room. We will recommend to friends and family coming through Bend that want to stay in a house/neighborhood.
Very clean, uncluttered and comfortable stay! Kitchen was well stocked for all of your cooking needs.
We enjoyed all the modern amenities at this property.

Beautiful home! It was exactly how pictures appeared. Andrew was very communicative and responsive to questions. Check in was a breeze and the kitchen was stocked with all essentials to cook a family meal. Only 10 minutes from downtown. Would definitely recommend!

Wonderful house, with great living spaces, and comfortable bedrooms. We had everything we needed and enjoy the tranquility of them home. Will be sharing this listing with friends who travel to Bend. Thank you
Amazing place to stay!

Wonderful place to stay. It’s spacious, comfortable and well appointed. The kitchen was very well stocked!
Highly recommended.

The listing is very comfortable. We enjoyed our stay. We appreciate that the furniture was of good quality. We liked that it was well stocked with amenities. We had breakfast on the patio and enjoyed birds and squirrels around chirping. I highly recommend this place for a stay in Bend.

Andrew's home is a fantastic place to stay at when visiting Bend! The home is spotless and includes all the amenities you could need - high end finishes, stocked pantry, great decor, nice patio with a grill, Peloton for getting a nice ride in, etc. Andrew's home is an exceptional place to visit with friends or family, and serves as a great home base for exploring all that Bend has to offer. Look forward to staying here again in the future!
House was clean, check in was a breeze, and it was a nice quite community.
Everything great!! Great house and great stay. Highly recommended!

Great property in SE Bend! Home is brand new, super clean and has many amenities! Very nicely decorated and spacious! The property is located in a new development and on a street that dead ends, so there's not any traffic. Just a quick ride to downtown and easily accessible to many of the shopping areas located close by. While I was hoping to make use of the BBQ area, it didn't feel private enough due to an RV park directly behind the property. The kitchen was stocked beyond our expectations and even had most major condiments available for use as well as pastas, etc. The house looks extremely large in the pictures, but, there's only a laundry room on the first floor, so, everything is on the 2nd floor level. I really enjoyed the large master bedroom and bathroom! I had hoped to get more of a restful night's sleep, but couldn't because of a close by train track that is extremely loud and startling in the middle of the night.

This rental was pefect. We stayed for a short weekend stay in Bend. It was absolutely the cleanest home we have stayed in. The location was great and close to everything. We had 6 adult family members and felt we had so much room to stretch out after a long day on the river. The deck was peaceful and had a trail just behind the house where we could walk the dogs. We will definitely stay here again.

This beautiful house was the perfect place to stay in Bend. It is tucked away in a quiet neighborhood that backs up to an open space with trails (great for dog walking) and a short drive to the river, downtown Bend and easy access to highway 97. The house is spacious, clean and includes everything you could possibly need. We loved cooking in a kitchen stocked by a professional chef! Andrew was super helpful and always responded quickly to messages. We highly recommend this AirBnb and look forward to scheduling another stay in the future.

Gorgeous comfortable and spacious home. Nice quiet area and home at the end of the street. Great hiking literally just steps from the back of the house. Super comfy beds. Kitchen had everything we could need. We will definitely be back!

We needed last minute accommodation as the place we’d booked fell through. We booked and checked in 15 minutes later. The space was perfect for a couple working and skiing. We looked onto a creek and walking path. The place was spotless and had everything we needed. Comfortable bed and linens. For someone with asthma it was a relief not to have any fragrances used for cleaning or linens. Would definitely stay again.
Great little place, super private, looks just like the pictures…Jessica was super helpful

The place was just the right size. Very clean. Good A/C. The shampoo/lotion was very small bottles, so be prepared to bring your own. Easy parking and nice to be able to sit out front and watch the little river.
This spot is a hidden gem. This stay is close to everything in Bend and was a quiet private retreat when back at the cottage. Will definitely stay here again and highly recommend!

Jessica was a great host! Responsive and friendly. The cottage was spotless! It was almost like we were the first guests. It backed to a beautiful creek and was quiet and private. We appreciated the included parking. It was a short walk to Old Mill and Hayden Homes Amphitheater. We would definitely visit again the next time we are in Bend!

Great little place! Perfect location for all the outdoor activities that Central OR has to offer! Uber was readily available for a quick ride into the Old Mill district and Bond St. area. The house was well furnished and spotless. The kitchen was more than well equipped with everything to prepare meals and even Tupperware for leftovers. The neighborhood is extremely quiet at all times. Jessica responded with in moments regarding any questions we had. The parking area was safe and quiet. We had a wonderful stay and will certainly book again in the future!

We had such a fabulous time staying in Bend for a week. It was super convenient to have an easy parking spot for us to load up our snowboard gear and ride at Mt. Bachelor. It’s very convenient to get to practically everywhere in Bend. The place was brand new and everything worked perfectly. We sat outside and grilled multiple dinners. The kitchen is fantastic and came with practically every accessory we could thing of. Will definitely be staying there again in the future.
Very nice cottage. Just what I needed for my stay in bend. Would definitely recommend to anyone staying in bend.
Great location, comfortable home, fantastic communication. I would definitely stay here again!
home was great. Location on point. The only thing negative is that it didn’t snow and there wasn’t any in town, but that was outta your hands 🤗. Would love to be back
Great stay!

This place was great- perfectly located and super cute. The cottage was clean and cozy, had everything we needed, and it was a short walk to downtown. The hot tub was awesome after long rides and hikes during the day. We look forward to staying again next time we're in Bend.

We had such a fantastic stay! I came to Bend with my partner, our 7 month old baby, and our dog, and it suited all of our needs very well. The location is awesome --we walked all around town from the cottage. We love cooking so were thrilled with the well-appointed kitchen. Would definitely recommend this to anyone traveling to Bend.

This house was great for our weekend trip to Bend. We were able to walk downtown, be close to trailheads, and enjoy the hot tub. The hosts sent detailed instructions for check in and check out, and also checked in to make sure we had everything we needed. Thanks!
Very responsive and great location. Easily walkable to all downtown shops & restaurants!

Place was all you could ask for and want. Perfect location. Comfy. Clean. Close to anything and everything. Hot tub was perfect. Shower pressure will blow you away (literally) and the mattress was not too soft at all as noted by others. And this coming from a guy with a bad back that needs support. Beautiful time of year to be here. Owners are crazy fast responsive. Highly recommend.
House was spacious and clean
Great location, clean, easy to access. Nice hosts.
A great location! Walkable to what Bend has to offer. Super clean and plenty of space. Hot tub was great to relax in as well!

We absolutely loved the location of the house, it was walkable most places we wanted to visit during our trip. The home was family and pet friendly and all of our basic needs were met. The beds could use some upgrades but everything was clean and served us for the weekend. The host was responsive and welcoming, and we felt like if we had any issues or concerns they would be immediately addressed.
Incredible location, super clean house, wonderful amenities.

Great rental! This place is close to the river, beautiful parks, and to shops, breweries and restaurants. My only complaint is that the central AC does not work. The 2 bedrooms in the house have their own AC unit (the master has a window unit, and the 2nd bedroom has a floor unit that blows out the window). The issue arises if someone sleeps on the pull-out couches that are in the main living room or in the bonus room that has a door to the back yard. Those rooms are hot at night when you are trying to sleep. Other than the AC issue, the house was great!

The house was just as described and in a great area of Bend. The main downside for us came down to personal preference but we found the beds way too soft and so we slept really poorly the whole trip, we ended up on the pull out couch instead. Otherwise, the property managers were friendly and easy to communicate with and being able to bring our dogs and have a private yard was great!

We enjoyed our stay at A Stone’s Throw Bungalow. It was very convenient to walk downtown and along the river with the doggies. We were also very thankful for the room AC units and fans. Host was very communicative and house well stocked.
Great location!
This is a perfect location for discovering downtown Bend! It's in a great neighborhood, and has great walking access to the Deschutes river trail or restaurants and shops downtown.
This place is fantastic. The ideal place to center a weekend in Bend! Spotlessly clean and beautiful fenced garden for the pup! Well appointed and stocked with kitchen equipment! Loved it!!!
Great place. Centrally located and clean. We were very happy with the stay. Thank you!
Incredibly close to downtown made for a great Bend experience.

The place was incredibly clean! Hot tub was hot and just what we needed after exploring the area. Downtown is an easy walk and the beds are comfortable! Backyard is fully fenced and a great hangout area during the day.
Cute and clean space! perfect location to get downtown. really enjoyed our stay!
We really enjoyed our stay! The house was clean, had great amenities and is in an awesome location walking distance to downtown.

Great house in a great location! My husband, dog and I had a wonderful time here. It has everything we needed and more for our stay. Loved how close it was to downtown breweries and restaurants and the hot tub was perfect after a long day of hiking at Smith Rock. Would definitely stay here again the next time we’re in Bend!

The house was in a superb location! Very close to breweries, coffee, downtown Bend, ax throwing (it was so much fun!). The kitchen is well appointed, and the hot tub was fantastic after a long day of walking around exploring. Highly recommended. Would definitely stay again.

The location cannot be beat! We could walk to downtown Bend in under ten mins. The house was a perfect size for us with plenty of space, the backyard and hot tub were amazing to relax in after a long day of exploring. My only issue (and why I didn’t give it a five star rating) was because of the bed. The mattress was saggy and the frame itself is super squeaky so anytime you move or roll over, it would wake the other up. Not the best nights sleep during our stay but the hosts were very nice & welcoming the day of check in.

We really enjoyed our stay. The space was perfect for our family. The hot tub was lovely, and it is in a great location. Perfect! In addition, the hosts were super nice. We had to postpone our trip because our dog got injured at the very last minute, and the hosts were super nice about allowing us to postpone to an open week rather than cancel. We will definitely be back. Thanks very much.
This place is as close to downtown as you can get and is well appointed. This was our 4th time staying here!
Comfortable home in downtown Bend with great hot tub for aching muscles after skiing. Enjoyed our stay.
Great home in a great location. Host was responsive and helpful. We hope to stay here again!
Not to far from downtown. We enjoyed our stay. Two TVs. Both have easy hdmi connections.

This place is great for 2 people on a work or ski trip. It has all the things you need to cook and the hot tub is a nice addition. The bathroom is very small but the location of the house is excellent!
One of the best rental properties in Bend! We will continue to stay here for years to come.
Great location

A stones throw is a great place to stay! The home is very comfortable and had all the amenities we needed plus a hot tub we loved having access to. The location is great with easy access to everything in Bend. We’d definitely stay again!
The location of this home is perfect! The fenced backyard is great if you take your dog
Great cottage, easy walking distance to town and river, excellent AirBNB host.
Great location close to the river and downtown. Perfect for our family of five including three teens.

This is a basic house in a great location, close to river downtown and all the rest. We had a lovely time and hiked and swam and kayaked and played games at night. We were appreciate of the ease of check in and out. Very comfortable
Good location close to downtown (although located on a busy street). Host was quick to reply to our questions.

Everything was well thought out and covered it was easy to access the hot tub the bikes and everything else we needed to use. Plenty of bedding and the whole process was very smooth with great communication
Great location, responsive and kind hosts, and the place itself has lots of history and is very comfortable! We loved the yard and hot tub too. Definitely will stay again.
Incredible space close to the heart of Bend. We loved borrowing the bikes

This place is awesome! It’s perfectly situated to walk to downtown breweries. The hot tub is always nice, and they are super attentive to any questions or concerns! This is our second time renting with A Stone’s Throw, and we will definitely be back!
Sleeps 5 comfortably

Terrific stay for our trip! We had 3 adults and 4 kids, with adults having private bedrooms and kids on sofa beds and pack-n-play. The house has space for a group, is in a good neighborhood and very near to downtown (walkable). The road in front of the house is pretty busy but we were never out front as the back is private and fenced, and the hot tub was great after a day of skiing. Communication was fast and easy. The 30 minute drive to Mt Bachelor was easier than expected and scenic. We discovered Newport Avenue Market - strongly recommend for any grocery needs! We would stay again!
Wonderful home. Highly recommend, would love to come back.
Great location. Home was perfect for our family of four.
Cozy house with a great location for exploring downtown.
One of the best places we have stayed at in Bend!
Great location, responsive host, nice space
Wonderful stay! Amazing location, great communication. The house is very well stocked and beautifully decorated. The beds even had a very comfortable mattress topper. Would love to stay again.
Great home, with a nice backyard, comfy beds & close location to everything you’ll want to do in Bend

We had an amazing stay! The instructions were very easy to follow and we were very comfortable in the house. The location is perfect and only a few minute walk to the downtown area. Communication was prompt and everyone with the rental company was very friendly. I would highly recommend for a short or long stay in Bend!
This is a great place to stay. It’s clean and cute and in such an awesome location. We would love to stay here again sometime.

Our trip to Bend was wonderful and the people at A Stone's Throw in Bend did a great job with this location! The house was clean and everything worked perfectly. Their binder of information was very helpful but the best part about this place was how central it is to breweries and restaurants
Great place! It was clean, comfortable and close to many restaurants/breweries. We really enjoyed the hot tub and fenced-in backyard. It made for a lovely stay in Bend!
Great location and enjoyed the hot tub!
Lovely home in a great area! Wonderful spot for a Bend weekend away!
A nice space, better than the photos!

Great location! Easy walking distance to downtown Bend which was awesome. I appreciated the dog friendliness and the fenced in backyard was perfect for my dog. The place was very clean, tidy, comfy, well supplied. The bed in the small bedroom was on the softer side with egg crate style foam on top, I found it quite comfortable, but a heads up in case you don't care for that. You can park in front or in back in the driveway/parking spot off the alley. Overall a great stay with helpful, efficient and professional hosts.
A great spacious place with everything you need. Close to everything. Nicely decorated and plenty of room for 2 couples. Highly recommend!
Great cozy space with awesome location close to downtown.

This house is on a quiet street and an easy walk from central Bend. Street parking is right out front. It is very well kept up and comfortable, and the property managers, who appear to have other houses in the area, are responsive. We enjoyed the chance to use the kitchen and outdoor grill and can recommend the Newport Ave Market nearby. Of course, there is no shortage of places to eat and drink in town if that’s your preference. A couple of cruiser-style bikes are supplied though we didn’t try them. There is only 1 bathroom, so I would not recommend this house for larger groups. Also there is limited AC, though Bend seems to have cool temps at night so it wasn’t an issue for us. Definitely recommend this place- I only wish we got to stay longer.
The location was central to everything we we had planned in Bend. We had a lack of communication from one incident.

Great location! Shower pressure was on point and couldn't have asked for a nicer neighborhood that shows off Bend's personality. Everything in the house was on point as well from the kitchen, to the shower pressure in the shower. Definitely coming back!
Very close to town, two good sized bedrooms and a large kitchen.

We had a great stay here with our three kids. The location was perfect and we had enough space for all of us to sleep comfortably. There were some kitchen essentials (spices, etc) in the cabinets, games in the living room, and cable/Netflix if you need some downtime.
The house live in great location, convenient. We had a good time here!
We really enjoyed our stay here. Amazing location in a clean and comfortable home.

Great Location!! -- This home is clean and spacious. It is very close to downtown (5 minute walk), which makes it nice for walking or riding the bikes that are provided. If you need a spacious home with great walkability score, this one is good value for the square footage, but it only has one (1) bathroom that is very small. The backyard is private and has a jacuzzi, which was nice after hiking all day. The master bed is very comfortable.

What a fantastic place to stay. The location is ideal for exploring downtown Bend and walking around the beautiful residential neighborhoods. The house was perfect for our small group to cook a meal and hang out in the back yard. We loved having the bikes and hot tub! Thanks for the great visit to Bend!
Had a great time staying at A Stones Throw with my wife, infant and dog. Great location and the setup was perfect for our family.

Great location. Took kids to Bend for a few days. Loved that it was walking distance to downtown, hot tub big bonus, beds super comfortable and fenced in backyard was great for the kiddos. Would stay again.

This home is centrally located between downtown and some great residential areas that are a must see. You can walk to the bars/restaurants and shopping, or head out for recreation. All of the essential amenities were provided, and the hosts were also very helpful.
Very nice house. The beds are very comfortable. Also enjoyed the hottub. Good location in a nice neighboorhood near downtown. Would absolutely recommend this place for a nice stay in beautiful Bend.
Great location, pet friendly, and really nice little spot!
We loved staying here, close to town and parks. It was incredibly comfortable for our family, with two infants.

The best part of the house is the location! Close to downtown and everything else we did in Bend. The beds were very comfortable and plenty of extra towels and bedding. It was an extra bonus to have a high chair and pack and play already at the house for our use. Our daughter loved that the tv had Netflix already so she could watch some movies after a soak in the hot tub. We would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a place to stay on the Westside of Bend!

Very clean and spacious! No water from the fridge, but ice part works and they did provide a Brita filter water pitcher inside the fridge. The hot tub in the large, private backyard was amazing! I found this place to be quite in a suburb about a mile from downtown brewery's and shops. The initial description alluded that it was right downtown in the hustle and bustle with art and brewery walks. While it is walking/biking distance, I found the home to be in a quite and relaxing neighborhood.

Our family of 5 just spent a fabulous 2 days at this wonderful, sparkling clean Air B&B with all the amenities we could ask for! I had never been to Bend before so I didn’t realize that this was the ideal location! We walked to town with ease! My bed was SO comfy, and we all had our own space. The hot tub in the spacious backyard was perfect. We can’t wait to come back for another visit!
The yard was perfect for our dogs and the hot tub was a big bonus! The location is ideal, just a short walk to everything downtown Bend has to offer.
This is a great original Bend home, just a short walk from downtown and several parks. Excellent location and definitely worth the stay.

This Airbnb has so much charm and it’s in such a perfect Bend location! Walking distance to downtown, clean, great style and great hosts! It was easy and smooth to check in and out. We would definitely stay here again next time we visit!
Great place!

Perfect little cottage for a weekend ski trip to Mt. Bachelor. Hot tub at the end of a long ski day is a must! Great location, walking distance to all of the goodness downtown bend has to offer. Had a great stay!
We had such a great time in Bend! This place is so well located! Even in the snow we were able to walk to multiple breweries downtown for dinner.
We loved staying here!! Great location, hot tub, perfect house, and great/quick communication!
Great location, amenities, and fast responses from hosts. Will certainly stay here again on my next visit to Bend.
Heidi, Brook and Diana were amazing hosts. 100% communication, 100% friendly and 100% awesome stay
Solid place
This house is cozy and in a great location. We would stay here again.
Great location just off Drake Park and close to downtown. Excellent for walking anywhere you want to go. We had a great time!

Cascade Cottage is a great house to stay at and a great location near downtown Bend. Nothing beats a soak in the hot tub after a long day skiing or access to local restaurants and breweries. Our hosts had excellent communication both before check in and during our stay.

I drove up to bend with my girlfriend and our lil dog and loved how close you are to everything. The house was walking distance from downtown and only a couple drive to markets or other stores. The house was warm and inviting, and glad that it came with a fenced backyard to play fetch for our little girl(dog). The nights were cold but the house was warm , look forward to coming back in the future!! Would recommend!

Brook, Heidi and Diana's place was just perfect. Check-in was easy. Location was great - close to downtown Bend. The house was clean and had ample amenities. There is a fenced back yard with a spacious, luxuries hot tub. Really enjoyed our stay and would definitely consider booking again when in Bend next.
Quiet, cozy, and clean - a great find in the heart of Bend.
Great!

This house is in a great location. The hot tub was awesome and the neighborhood was quiet. There were plenty of utensils and the kitchen was nice and large.
However, this home really comfortably only sleeps 4. As the click-down futon in the 3rd bedroom isn’t adequate for sleeping 2 adults at all really. Maybe one or perhaps two kids. Plus, the pull out in the living room is permanently at a 45* angle, making it like sleeping in a recliner. Not to mention it’s in the common space, meaning if you want to use the living room to socialize you have to put it away and get it back out every night.
Other than the sleeping situation the house was nice. The linens and pillows were surprisingly wonderful. The heating system worked really well.
I did contact the host, Heidi, and responses were timely..... albeit disappointing. Which isn’t necessarily her fault as I apparently didn’t read thoroughly enough the description of the sleeping amenities/situation in the house.
Overall, since it doesn’t sleep 6 comfortably, I’d have to say it’s not the greatest value. But, that being said... what is in Bend, Or? If you’re looking for a 2 couple get away in Bend, it’s perfect.
A wonder place to stay in Bend. Very clean and comfortable with extra amenities. I would be happy to stay here again. Brook, Heidi, and Diana are very responsive and helpful.
nice place, strict rules, recommended for quiet guests only.

We stayed with our 1 year old daughter in this adorable, clean home for a week. We walked almost every day to down town Bend which was about a 10 minute walk (so easy!) and we loved that the park and Deschutes River was just a few blocks away. The house itself was clean, comfortable and had everything you needed. It has a lovely front porch that we hung out on in the early mornings and an awesome apple tree out front with delicious red apples on it. The beds were comfy, and the kitchen was fully stocked with cookware/utensils. The hot tub and back yard were a huge plus, and we loved spending the end of the evening soaking in the tub. I would definitely suggest this spot to friends!
Perfect spot for a family adventure. We loved the yard for our kiddos and the location was great to see the brew pubs and stores of downtown. We can’t wait to come back.

This house was absolutely beautiful and the location is amazing! Our family of 5 fit perfectly in this house with room to spare. It was our fist time visiting Bend and we will definitely be back again!

We felt right at home and our toddler was over the moon with the space to run around in the backyard completely safe. There were plenty of linens and towels for our stay which was much appreciated for the hot tub use. Super perk included the alley parking and entrance that made it easy to load and unload luggage. We did not take advantage of the bikes in the shed but will next time. There are so many bikers in Bend!!!
Thanks again for excellence— Amy
Great location close to downtown. Everything you need and friendly hosts. Would definitely stay again!
Amazing location! 5 minute walk to downtown bend. Really clean and welcoming. The use of a couple cruiser bikes was a nice added touch!
Great Location! Cute place! Able to walk to the shops and some great beer. Hot tub is great. Plenty of parking. Super cute. Thanks so much for a great stay.

Amazing space with a prime location. We were able to easily access the trails, breweries, and the river without needing a car.
House itself was one of my favorites I have stayed in, and was very well suited to having a group in it. The kitchen was clean & well stocked, backyard was perfect for lounging.
Check in and check out were smooth, and the hosts were very communicative over the app.
Perfect location! The house was comfy, quiet, and clean. Great spot for relaxation and enjoying bend.

It's always so nice to have the comforts of home. I was grateful for the coffee grinder to make fresh coffee every day, the spray n wash to really get the clothes clean, plenty of shampoo, conditioner and lotion plus the attention to our pup with his own bed and sheets. We'll definitely be visiting A Stones Throw again!!
The place was clean and gorgeous. They were great at communicating directions and were quick at replying. I definitely recommend this place for anyone looking for a nice getaway.

Location, location, location. What a great little house in a beautiful neighborhood SO close to downtown. My only regret is we had to leave. Bend was amazing and this is an optimal place to experience it. A 5 minute walk to downtown and Drake Park. Don't miss the Thursday night live music at the park- a great, family friendly event.
Great location! Loved the hot tub, fun and funky decor, well-appointed kitchen, good quality soaps/lotions. Highly recommend!!
House was great. Awesome location - walk to downtown. Hot tub was relaxing at the end of the day and shed was good for storing our bikes. Would gladly rent again.

The cascade cottage is the absolute perfect place for a Bend getaway. My girlfriends and I were able to walk to all the pubs and restaurants all weekend. The backyard is wonderful and the house is super clean, comfortable and cute. We highly enjoyed our stay and would recommend in the future!
Cascade Cottage is an absolutely delightful place to stay: Comfy beds, sparkling clean, well-appointed kitchen and luxurious hot-tub. The location is also perfect. Thank you, A Stone's Throw!

A Stone's Throw in Bend was perfect for our party of 5. Super clean and perfectly located, the hosts were incredibly kind and provided thorough clear and prompt communications. Also a good value considering everything in town was within a 10 minute walk. Thanks for the great stay!
This was a great, centrally located place. I really enjoyed the hot tub!
We loved staying in this cute house. We enjoyed the porch, hot tub and the VERY short bike ride to town. We will definitely stay again when we come to Bend.
Great location. Walking distance to downtown Bend.
Amazing. Needs a note about where to park. Parking is outback in alley way. Great little fenced in backyard. Very cozy. Within walking distance to downtown Bend and restaurants!
This is a great home in a fun location! Close to the river and great restaurants! We loved the hot tub in the fully fenced backyard! It was perfect for our little pup.
In the beginning, the commutation and professionalism were top notch and did not disappoint when we arrived at the property and enjoyed our stay. We’ll be back. Thank you!
Highly recommended. Communication, cleanliness, location and more was absolutely amazing!

Perfect location to town and to Mt. Bachelor. Very clean, well stocked and great beds! The hot tub is awesome to have after a fun day on the slopes.
We really enjoyed our stay at A Stone's Throw and would definitely stay here in future trips to Bend
Solid place. Kitchen is great for a larger group, but only one small bathroom so I don't know if I would have more than 3 people stay here longer than a few days.

A Stone's Throw place was great! It was in a very convenient location- we walked downtown every night even in the cold weather! The house was clean, comfortable beds and a fantastic hot tub. I would love to stay there again my next trip to Bend and highly recommend it.
Great place. Clean and easy communication.

This place was great! My husband and I stayed here with two other couples for a long weekend of exploring Bend and skiing at Mt. Bachelor and this place could not have been more perfect. The house was perfectly equipped for the 6 of us with plenty of amenities to make us feel at home, and the hot tub was well maintained and wonderful for relaxing. It was also a 5min walk from multiple breweries and the start of the cute downtown area where we spent plenty of time exploring shops and filling up the growler provided by the house. Definitely would recommend!
My boyfriend and I loved staying at Stones Throw. It's conveniently close to downtown Bend and we had everything we needed without having to ask. Would definitely stay again!
The perfect place to stay while in bend! A short ten minute walk to downtown- amazing shops, restaurants and breweries. 25 minutes to mount bachelor. Would totally stay again.
Very easy checkin, with the keyless entry. Nice location to downtown and restaurants. The house was very comfortable and the hot tub was great.
We had a wonderful stay!
Quiet little nice bend home close to brewery’s!! Nice hot tub and backyard!!

We loved how conveniently located this house is as well as how neat and tidy it was! We also greatly appreciated the clear instructions for check in as well as the guidebook they had available for things to do in the area. The home is smaller than it may appear in pictures and really only sleeps 4 comfortably given there is only one bathroom. But overall we absolutely loved our experience and would definitely stay again!
Great place! Perfect location.

The cottage is in a great location and is walking distance from many great places. The host offers ideas as to what to do during your stay. We had six adults and all were very comfortable in the home. The hot tub is a great plus as well!

A perfect location with comfortable furnishings made for a lovely short-term visit to Bend. Listing perfectly captures what to expect from from this cottage. I look forward to returning here in the near future.

This house is in a great location, we walked to dinner with our kids several times. Hot tub was perfect size, kitchen was great, we enjoyed our stay with our two young kids. The only thing we noticed was a bit of street noise but this should be expected given how close to everything the house is.
The courage is in a convenient location to a lot of restaurants in the city and is easy to get to from the highway. Hot tub is great to relax in after a day of hiking.
The great reviews of this house are well-deserved! It's clean and provides everything you need for a comfortable stay.

This was the perfect home base for my mother, sister and me to explore Bend and central Oregon. Thanks for sharing your fantastic place with us! Fantastic location - quiet, but convenient to downtown, super clean and comfortable. We loved the location and strolled the few minutes into downtown at least once every day. The house had ample space for the three of us to relax together or in our own cozy spaces. The beds and linens were very cozy and comfortable. We made a few meals and found the kitchen to be very clean and well stocked. We were only there for a few days, but would have been comfortable for much longer. Highly recommended!
Great spot to stay! Walkable distance to downtown and other eateries. Great access to walking trails. Back yard was excellent for the dog and relaxing in the hot tub!
Wonderful home in a great Bend neighborhood! We throughly enjoyed our stay, the home was perfect for two couples and was both modern and cozy. We will definitely be back!
My friends and I spent the weekend here while we were in town visiting friends. We loved all being able to be in the same place, and the backyard and hot tub were great for us to gather.

Wonderful place to stay! Everything was as described and the hosts were very communicative. You are literally waking distance to everything. I strongly recommend using the parking they have in the ally behind the house as the street in front of the house is very busy.
Perfect location, loved by our entire family!!!
Our family had a excellent stay! Nice cute, updated house in a great location.
We loved the location of this cottage. The kitchen was great and so was the little back yard. The third room was perfect for our toddler. We would love to stay here again.

This adorable cottage has anything and everything you need. Perfect location, wonderful hot tub, super comfortable beds and linens, great kitchen, washer &a dryer. I can't say enough great things about this place! We had a blast on our girls weekend in Bend! Thank you!

This is a great little house. We had a group of 6 staying in Bend for a wedding and we had a great time in this house. The place was very clean and it's a short walk to downtown and a cute park along the river.
Very clean and comfortable. Easy check in and out. Short walk to downtown. Highly recommended.

We were very pleased with this place, a perfect spot for a few days in and around downtown Bend. Check-in process was smooth and very simple, and the house was great. Downtown is definitely within walking distance, but we chose (mostly due to weather) to go the Uber route if we planned to be out drinking. Inexpensive and very convenient.
Would recommend this rental.

Our group stayed at this home while visiting Bend for a relay race. It was exactly as described, very clean, and in a great location! The hot tub was a particular favorite, especially after a long day of running!

This house is a short walk through beautiful streets to the river and downtown area. There are many parks nearby, perfect for children. The home is clean and well furnished, had everything we needed for a family of 4 adults and two children including comfortable beds with nice linens/down comforters, plenty of towels, games, comfortable seating, and well equipped kitchen with nice dishes/glassware. The hot tub was not as hot as we like it, we did not look into adjusting the temp setting.
The place was amazing! Chris and Marta were great hosts.
What a great location! Quiet neighborhood with easy access to town and parks. Great for the family. Would recommend to anyone.
Great location! Hosts were very attentive and accommodating!

Great place to stay! The house is clean and roomy, and the hot tub was a wonderful amenity. Just note that it isn't actually three blocks from downtown. Factor in a little more of a walk if you want to walk to restaurants or bars.

Diana, Chris and Marta's place was perfect - close to downtown, affordable, comfortable and of course the hot tub. Our group came for a short ski trip with a full house plus a dog. The fenced backyard is perfect for the dog while the group hung out back. The beds are super comfortable and the shower water pressure is amazing. We walked to Mirror Pond and downtown for dinner each night. Couldn't have asked for more out of the house and I would recommend it to anyone I know. We will definitely be back in the future. Thanks.
Fantastic Location right in downtown Bend. Hot tub was an unexpected treat to come home to after snowboarding. Well maintained house with all the necessities.
We would absolutely choose this place again. We instantly felt right at home and had everything we could need.

This place is amazing! 6 of us fit more than comfortably in it and it served as an excellent home base for our Bend adventures. The house comes with most amenities, including shampoo/conditioner in the bathroom and oil/spices/containers in the kitchen. The hot tub was lovely after a day of hiking or beer drinking. And downtown is just a 10-15 minute walk away. If we were to ever come back to Bend, I would definitely stay here again!
This place was perfect. Very clean and nice. The BBQ and a hot tub during winter was a plus. Downtown bars and restaurants were in walking distance as well which made our stay convenient.
Excellent house, it had everything one would need for time away from home. The bed were comfortable and the hot tub was warm!
Great house, great location!
Very responsive owners

I really enjoyed staying in this home during a ski trip to Bend. We are a family with older teens and young adults. This is a cute recently renovated mid century house in central Bend- warm, hardwood floors, nice modern furnishings, full modern kitchen, washer drier, nice big hot tub with an easy to remove cover. The hosts communicated well, offered to clear snow as needed. With winter weather we didn't take advantage of the deck, BBQ and bikes, but I'd think it would be a great summer home. The home could work well for two couples or for families with children.
This is a fantastic place at a great price point. The house was clean and well prepared for our stay. Excellent value and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a budget getaway.
The house is centrally located, clean, and comfortable. Diana, Chris & Marta were prompt in answering any questions and provided an environment where we felt at home.

The hosts were communicative and we had everything we needed. They even checked in mid-weekend to see if we had everything necessary. The location was awesome. We were able to walk to dinner both nights downtown. The hot tub was relaxing as well.
Really quaint home located very close to down town... Home is very cozy and a very comfortable stay!
We had a great couple of days in bend at their house. The house is small but clean, well-equipped, and comfortable. The location is fantastic too.

The house is in an awesome location, walking distance from everything. We arrived and everything was very clean and a perfect size for two couples. If we make it back to Bend we'll try and stay here again!
We had a great stay here during a weekend and then couple days in town for work. Great amenities and easy walk to downtown.

Our stay was pleasant and comfortable, and our hosts were communicative and helpful.
We had a great time.

The host seemed very friendly, didn't ask a bunch of questions about our stay. I liked that I didn't feel I was getting hounded for my life's story. I got a Message with the entry information prior to our arrival, the owners weren't there when we showed up which was nice since we had been in a car for 3 hours and needless to say were ready to just relax for a bit.
The house was very charming, the pictures made it seem smaller than it actually feels when you're inside. Very open space, clean, well decorated and they had information and instructions for everything in the house. We came to Bend to do some exploring and needed a place to call home on our down time, this was perfect! The beds were extremely comfortable as well.
The next time we are planning a trip to Bend this will definitely be on our list to find reservations!
Quiet neighborhood; comfortable beds; very convenient to downtown and major roads. Minor question quickly and efficiently addressed by owner. nice stay and good value.

Great location with good proximity to downtown. Excellent guest book with awesome local info. Yard and hot tub are very nice. Kitchen is very well equipped with sharp knives and plenty of quality cooking gear. Comfortable beds. Clean smelling towels. Secure storage for bikes, etc. Key code locks make it easy to share access. Nice high speed Internet. Two off street parking spots off the rear alley with easy access. We were extremely pleased with the accommodations.

The place was wonderfully decorated, very clean, and spacious. The location is simply incredible, with a short walk to everything! And the spa was fantastic to relax in after an active day. I highly recommend this place!
Check in was easy and quick! The house was in a great location close to everything in Bend. Would definitely stay again!
Great place in an excellent walkable location! Beds were comfy, we enjoyed the hot tub, and the hosts thought of lots of little details that helped make our stay more enjoyable.
It was amazing best air BNB I have stayed at and at a great value

Our stay in Bend was made so much better by having this lovely home to return to each night! The Hot-Tub was a plus to my husband and daughter. Walking distance from most things we wanted to do was an added plus. The house is easy to get around in and figure out, along with the neighborhood being quaint. Thank you for making our stay a very good one!
Great location. Beautiful little house with character.
Our stay at the bungalow was great. The space was quiet, clean and exactly as described.
thanks again hopefully i can come back

A private feeling little Bungalow on a small compound just north of town.
Beautifully landscaped.
Nice and cozy place!
Great little studio in a pretty juniper forest
Love this place and would definitely book again!!! 100%

This is my perfect rating of 10+++.. Nothing is better than Yuvia and Tim’s place. Heaven.. perfect.. tge best night sleep in the world. Kindest people, easy going and helpful. Love this place So much. Absolutely stunning property, amazing value

Yuvia’s place is really special, and was located perfectly for our stay, partway between Bend and Smith rock. It’s comfortable, feels very peaceful and calm. Tim and Yuvia gave us a lot of great recommendations on the area for biking, hiking, etc. We were really comfortable and at home there, they even hammocks under the beautiful juniper trees. They have a special thing going there and we’d happily return the next time we’re in the area.
