We couldn’t be happier with Katie’s place. It was like a home away from home with a once in a life time view! The stay at Katie’s place made our trip to Bend so easy and memorable!
The view is amazing and it’s only a few minutes from all the fun bend has to offer!
The views are spectacular, especially the sunset behind the mountains!

Lovely pastoral setting, very peaceful with horses, cows and sheep nearby. Sweet space, very thoughtfully decorated with loads of amenities. Hosts were quick to reply to messages and brought extra bedding. I would stay here again.
Katie's place great! Super cute design, super clean and check in and out was a breeze. Quick response as well. Not to mention the breathe taking views from the patio door!
Absolutely stunning view! Located within a good distance for many different activities. Katie and Brook were incredibly hospitable and helpful providing local tips etc! Very flexible and welcoming!

We enjoyed our stay at Katie’s place. It was a great spot for us to stay while snowboarding at Mt. Bachelor. Small, cozy, and a major perk to be able to use the garage! Katie was a great host, she made check in and out very easy and made sure we had what we needed. We would suggest this place to others.

Katie’s place is beautiful and cozy! Unfortunately we didn’t get to experience the gorgeous views due to lots of snow, but we came to Bend to enjoy that snow. We are hoping to come again during the summer!! Katie’s place is very easy to find, clean and you get your own garage to use during your stay which is so awesome during the winter season. The absolute best part of our stay was getting to meet Katie’s dogs! They both came and greeted us and it made our whole experience so perfect. My husband & I would both highly recommend staying here, we definitely plan on staying again!
This place has a million dollar view of the Cascade Mountains. Really spectacular.

Great place to stay, all you would want. The property is absolutely beautiful with horses, cows & goats to see. The hospitality was amazing, Katie and her husband are amazing, great conversations with them! Thank you!
Perfect little place for two. The view of the mountains was spectacular! We really appreciated being able to park in the garage because we were there during a snowstorm.

We found Katie's place very comfortable. The space is private, a separate small apartment with use of garage. We were there for a climbing competition for my teen, and he found the foam mattress queen bed extremely comfortable. I enjoyed the harder futon/couch. The space was cozy, clean and with nice touches. The wide view of land and the mountain range beyond was stunning. We loved seeing cows and horses out the window, on a neighboring property. Katie and Brooks were very communicative and Brooks generously offered suggestions on places to visit. The couple's two dogs graciously welcomed us as we came and went. We highly recommend their place!

Cozy studio, and although it was cloudy during our stay, the view was still great! Plenty of parking for small or larger vehicles, and outstanding hosts, who's hospitality and friendliness made the stay that much better! Highly recommend Katie's place!

The check in process is just the best I have ever experienced in all of my Airbnb experiences. The check in process was so smooth. (Honestly, on par with the best Airbnb stays I’ve had) The guest house is spotless, warm and inviting. We had the best sleep; cozy room, super quiet setting, very nice bed, effective heating for cold weather. Everything I wanted after a long road trip.

From the listing all the amenities and what's to be expected about the place was pretty accurate. Nice location for the price when visiting Bend. We were welcomed by Brooks and he was very helpful giving tips of places to eat and drink. The absolute winner for this AirBnb is the views of the mountains and snow. We were also lucky to have a full moon that night with the light glowing on the snow.

Katie’s place is a true gem! When we arrived, we were greeted by her husband who showed us the way and made us feel welcome. The property is a quick little drive from the heart of Bend but it is quiet and peaceful. You truly feel like you’re experiencing central Oregon at its finest. The place was clean, the instructions were simple and the check-out was a breeze. I cannot wait to stay here again!

This cozy little apartment was just as described. Easy communication, great location, nice people, and beautiful views. You're provided your own parking spot in the garage and pretty much everything you could need in the apartment. The view of the mountains in the backyard from bed is a perfect start to the morning. This was a great stop on our travels. We can't wait to stay again in the future!
Katie’s place is awesome! What a view! It had nice cozy and very private feel. I highly recommend staying here.

We had a nice short trip to Sisters and used Katie's place more for a place to sleep compared to using the room for the whole day. The house was easy to find, as we arrived after dark and self check-in was easy.
We would recommend for a quick trip to Sisters or Bend anytime
The apartment is amazing. It is well stocked, has an amazing view, and is everything I was expecting and more.

Super great location and nice to wake up to a view! The space was nice and clean with the cutest private back patio. Lots of great resources on where to shop,eat,hike ect. we had a great time, highly recommend.
Great place, great people, great view.
Absolutely perfect guest home! We couldn’t be happier with the service and the room. Very thoughtful owners. The view overlooking the mountains is incredible to wake up to.
I just love eastern Oregon and the views from this property capture the imagination.
great stay, great hosts!

This was our favorite Air B and B experience EVER. Katie and Brooks are so accommodating and friendly, and the book of recommendations was invaluable in planning our time in Bend. The land is gorgeous and the space so cozy- we loved being home as much as we loved exploring. We also really enjoyed the opportunity to use the fire pit in the backyard- we were sad to leave and we plan to stay here again!
Cozy guesthouse with a gorgeous view of the mountains. A quick drive into Bend and surrounding area. Check in/out was easy. Definitely recommend!

The guest house is in a gorgeous setting and a clean and comfortable space. Fantastic communication and recommendations, including one for a beautiful hike to Tamolitch Blue Pool. I’d love to come back!
Great location. Great communication. Great dogs. Great view. Great price.
Great space, very private with great views!

Brooks and Katie’s place is a perfect spot right outside of downtown Bend. There is so much room to enjoy the property and views! We brought our two year old with us and the space was perfect for a small child, and he loved meeting and running around with the dogs Hank and Remy. We will definitely stay here again the next time we visit Bend!
Such a great place to stay right outside Bend! This Airbnb was a quaint, comfortable and clean place. Very thoughtful recommendations and very hospitable hosts. Will be back again to stay here!

What a wonderful place to get a little R&R. After several long days on the road, I enjoyed lounging and relaxing in Katie’s place. Comfortable, had everything I needed and was clean and cozy. Would love to visit in the spring or summer to enjoy the outdoor area! Will definitely stay again.
Great hosts, great view, great place.
Great space with an incredible view!

Just as lovely as pictured, both inside and out. Thoughtful local tips and recommendations provided in a notebook, clean, comfortable, pretty space inside, deer and mountains and sunshine outside. Instructions clear and easy to follow. Would gladly stay again.
Close to Tumalo, trails and easy access to Bend. Lovely views and a quiet space with all the amenities needed for a pleasant stay. Hosts Katie and Brooks were kind and generous.
So many great things to say: beautiful decor, comfortable bed, attention to details, private, friendly and to top it off a stunning view!! Looking forward to next time!!!
Brooks and Katie were super hospitable, kind, and attentive to our every need. Beautiful property. Beautiful house. Beautiful view.
Amazing views!
Cute place with great decorating and touches for visitors. Very clean with great views!

Katie and Brooks were wonderful hosts whose thoughtful recommendations really added to our experience. Their place is probably the best value in the area for a couple wanting to explore what the region (beyond Bend, itself) has to offer. Thank you!

Have stayed at Katie and Brooke's place several times. It is the first place we try to book when heading to the Bend area. Quiet, beautiful views and close to everything. They are wonderful hosts! The apartment is cheerfully decorated, and the bed is super comfortable....just right for us. Love staying here!
Very friendly and hospitable hosts, beautiful view and property, cozy space. Would definitely recommend!
A warm welcome, stunning views and location plus a great outdoor space.
Katie’s apartment was absolutely darling, and the view is gorgeous! Highly recommend if you are staying in Central Oregon.
Beautiful view of the Cascades from the back patio, comfortable accommodations, cows mooed us to sleep. Brooks was quick to respond to any of our needs.

Katie and Brooks are super kind, and we fell in love with their place. It was quiet, charming, and comfortable.... exactly what we wanted for our night. We wished the space would have been available longer for us, but it’s a gem! I loved waking up and having coffee while looking out to the mountains and winding down at night with a glass of wine. The best part was the hospitality. You cannot find better hosts. Thank you so much for having us.
Fantastic views; great peaceful place and we loved the dog Rémi who is a riot! Also we saw deers at dusk which was amazing. Go and visit!

Such a nice and quiet little place to stay! So peaceful and beautifully decorated. Loved that we had a small little backyard spot to see the stars and beautiful mountain views. Katie and Brooks were great hosts and made sure we had what we needed while we were. Also, they had the cutest pups. We hope to be back again!
Katie communicated clearly and promptly before, during and after our stay. The place was spotless and had all the amenities we needed. The view was beautiful and the patio delightful.

Katie's place was as advertised and then some. The close proximity to Bend allowed us amazing fun filled adventures, while the rural setting provided the perfect getaway at night. The room is adorable, with great style and all of the amenities necessary to enjoy your stay. I will definitely be recommending Katie to my family and especially my outdoor enthusiast friends.
Lovely little place, juste outside of Bend, as seen on the picture, but the breathtaking view on the Sisters is even better. Super clean, well equiped, and super hosts. Thanks again!

We had a great stay, it's a cute place with an absolutely gorgeous view. The only negative we had was that the shower made a very high pitched whistle, which didn't make us want to shower for too long. Everything else was wonderful.
Clean, beautiful view, great suggestions on things to do and I would say great value for the amenities and peace and quiet that you get!
Everything was as advertised. Great views, great communication, great recommendations for the area. Would love to come back again someday!

Katie and Brooks place was spectacular! The apartment was super clean and bed was very comfortable. The panoramic view of the mountains from the patio was breath taking. My wife and I enjoyed every second of our stay and can't wait to come back.
Quiet, comfortable place to stay away from the Bend traffic and hub-bub. About a 10-12 minute drive into town. Brooks and Katie are so friendly and accommodating! We’d go back for sure!

Katie’s place was a perfect place to stay in Bend. Perfectly clean, with lots of thoughtful touches and an incredible outdoor space. We loved stargazing outside at night on the lounge by the suite, and it was so nice to wake up to the incredible view through their big glass door! They had everything you needed to cook (though we opted for pizza instead) and make coffee in their little kitchen area, and provided great recommendations for things to do in the area. All in all, we couldn’t have asked for a better experience or more friendly and helpful hosts! We are dreaming of coming back already. Thanks Katie and Brooks!

This place is private and quiet. Short drive to Bend with incredible views of the volcanic peaks that define central Oregon. The place is very nicely decorated, the bed is comfortable and Katie and Brooks are great hosts.
The views and location near downtown, but off the beaten path are amazing!

We enjoyed spending a night in this cozy guesthouse. It was very clean and had a well stocked kitchenette. We really liked the peace and quiet. Great little coffee shop and food carts were a quick drive into town. Katie was a great communicator and we got lucky with an early check-in. Such a beautiful place to spend time.
Beautiful place! Quiet and quaint! We loved staying here as the view was perfect!

This place is great. The hosts, Katie and Brooks are very sweet. Their animals are amazing!! Remi!! They let us use their tubes to float the nearby river. We will definitely will be coming back. Thanks again for the hospitality.
This is an incredible place to stay! You’re surrounded by mountains, green grass, horses, goats and hummingbirds...it’s peaceful and restores your soul! I will definitely be back in the future
This was our second stay at Katie’s place. We found it just as we did two years ago. We love the view of the mountains!
Such a great space, great views, great hosts. Love this place!

Katie’s place is perfect!
Quiet, serene setting looking out across meadows to beautiful mountains. An outside table & chairs to take in the views. Inside is perfect for two people, clean & cozy. When passing through Bend again I would definitely stay here, so much better than a hotel : )

My husband and I stayed 3 nights with Katie, Brooks and their wonderful pets. You will not find nicer people to host you or sweeter dogs to cuddle with. The mountain views out the back are stunning and the bed is very comfortable. This was the perfect place to base our adventure in Bend from and was an easy drive to wherever we wanted to go

Katie and Brooks were fantastic hosts! They were so warm and welcoming. My husband and I were impressed with how thought out the Airbnb was, you can tell that they took the time and care to decorate and stock the Airbnb with essentials. For example: assortment of dishes in the kitchen, clean towels, plenty of local guides and information, fan for warm nights, etc. We had everything we needed and were super comfortable during our stay. Also want to mention that the sunset over the Sisters (which you can see from the Airbnb and outdoor patio) is absolutely beautiful!

If you're looking for a beautiful, tranquil, comfortable place to stay with spectacular views, you just found it.
Watching the sunset over those mountains was breathtaking.
Katie was happy to answer my questions and give recommendations when I arrived.
Silent nights and a comfy bed were just the ticket after long days of exploring. The kitchen had everything I needed but I opted for eating out and was surprised how close the apartment was to fantastic food.
This will be my private get away whenever I'm in the Bend area.
Thank you Katie, Brooks, Remi, Hank and Jack the cat!

If you are looking for a quaint, friendly getaway place to stay around the Bend area with $1M dollar views this is the place. Katie and Brooks were very helpful ever since we made the reservation and welcome us with a warm greeting upon arrival. Perfect for 2 people with plenty of relaxing outside furniture to hang out be in the middle of nature at it's best. A helpful book of local tips and reccos on where to eat/hike/shop was perfect as well.
Katie's place is beautifully decorated, very quiet and comfortable. The best feature was watching the sunrise and sunset over the Sisters from the patio. Absolutely gorgeous view!
Would recommend to everyone!

Gorgeous, quiet location with spectacular views of the Sisters! Katie and her husband were very welcoming and made our stay very comfortable. Highly recommend this apartment for a relaxing getaway in Bend!

Katie’s home was nothing short of beautiful. The room is perfectly decorated and the hospitality was outstanding. My friend and I were so happy with their outdoor porch area and had a glass of wine with mountain views. It was perfection!
Bed was comfortable and room was immaculate. The pups were a great addition as well :)
We can’t wait to come again!
Thank you Brooks and Katie!

Katie's place is exactly as she pictured (AMAZING!), but you can't understand the view until you visit in person. With your own patio, bbq grill, hummingbird feeder, and the picturesque mountain backdrop, this is the place you want to relax after taking in all of the activities Bend has to offer.

Katie and Brooks were wonderful hosts. Their space is beautiful and offers an unbelievable view from the back patio/firepit area. Be sure to read their recommendations, they made one of our mornings by recommending a local restaurant in Bend for brunch. Great conversationalists and exceptional people to stay with.
Great stay!

Katie's studio apartment is very cute, cozy and clean. There is plenty of space for a couple and a third person can sleep on the futon. The location was perfect for us, as it was a short drive to several attractions including Smith Rock, Sisters and Downtown Bend. We had beautiful mountain views- just as the photos show. I highly recommend staying here for a vacation in Central Oregon.

First and foremost, Katie and Brooks are incredible hosts AND lovely people. They went above and beyond to make sure we had everything we needed. The space was clean, the bed was comfy, and the view is everything it is made out to be - gorgeous! Strongly recommend that anyone staying in the Bend/Sisters area stay with Katie and Brooks.

Stopped here for a quick overnight on our way to Portland. This was the perfect little resting spot. The place was very clean and had everything we needed. The view was spectacular, and we enjoyed the back porch area. We got a visit from a very sweet kitty while we checked out the view.
The communication between us was excellent. Katie and Brooks were very accommodating. Enjoyed our stay very much.
Lovely apartment situated in a beautiful location. The views are amazing. Private and relaxing.
The place has all the little touches. The kitchen stuff was just what we needed, the bed was super comfortable, the shower was perfect. Toss in the great view and you're covered.

Katie and Brooks are truly amazing hosts! They are super friendly, hospitable, and the BEST with offering local recommendations while visiting the Bend area! The apartment was spacious, sparkling clean and beautiful! And their property is just gorgeous! One of the favorite parts of our trip was the gorgeous sunset from the patio. I’d most definitely stay here again anytime we are in the area!

This was the perfect place to sit, chill, and wind down during our west coast road trip. You just can’t beat the views of the mountains! If we are ever in the Bend area again, we’ll be sure to stay there again!
Had a wonderful time at Katie and Brooks airbnb! The views are absolutely stunning. Would highly recommend!

This was our second time staying at Katie’s place. This is our favorite place to stay when we are in the Bend area. It is very relaxing yet you are still close to Bend for any activities you would like to do.
Incredible views, we sat out back with a glass of wine a fire and watched the sunset
What an amazing place to stay! The view was incredible and the living arrangements were very comfortable. The private garage was convenient. Wish we could have stayed longer.
A cozy and comfortable little place with standard amenities but an extraordinary view.

My wife and I really enjoyed staying at Katie’s place. It was peaceful and quiet, with beautiful surroundings. It was also a quick drive to Bend’s restaurants and shops. Communication was great and we would definitely recommend this rental to other travelers.
Beautiful views of the mountains and a great location, close to Bend and Sisters.
Katie’s place was lovely. We enjoyed the gorgeous view of the sisters mountains. We will definitely be back again

Quiet and very scenic space that is perfect for two people. Brooks and Katie were great hosts and are very knowledgable about the area, very personable and very quick and responsive with communication. They made us feel very welcome and gave us lots of local tips and ideas for our trip. They are located very close to Bend and a great central location for checking out all the surrounding towns to include Smith Rocks. We are looking forward to returning!!

My husband and I had a great and relaxing stay! The view is absolutely gorgeous, the room is stylish and comfortable, and Katie was a great host and gave us good suggestions for places to eat. Make sure you’re around to watch the sun set over the mountains!
Loved our stay! Beautiful with great view. Clean. Katie was easy to communicate with and left easy check-in instructions.

Katie’s place is very comfortable and in a beautiful location with a view of the Cascades.
It is an easy drive into Bend. We, unfortunately, had only one night in the area. Stay longer than that!
Amazing view! We loved our stay at Katie’s place!

My boyfriend and I had a great stay here! Katie and Brooks were very hospitable and offered great suggestions of places to go and things to do. The space was neat and had an amazing view of the mountains. We hope to come back someday!
Katie and her husband Brooks were fantastic hosts. What a great place to stay with easy access to both Bend and Redmond. The view out the backdoor of the Cascades is amazing.!

I highly recommend staying here! Katie has created a lovely space full of love, warmth, and thoughtful attention to details. She and Brooks are fantastic hosts. They greeted me when I arrived and I felt like I was staying with old friends. They've written up descriptions of their favorite local eateries and outdoor activities that inspired me to try to get back to their place for a longer stay so I can check out more of their recommendations. And the mountain view out the back through the glass doors is truly spectacular. I would absolutely stay here again. Thank you for creating such a lovely and inviting space!

Comfy space with AMAZING views of the Cascades! Off the beaten path but very easy to access and only minutes from everywhere you want to be. Super quiet and private. Katie has decorated this cute little apartment in eclectic style. Comfy bed, a garage for your car or gear...pretty perfect. I would love to return in the summer and use the private patio and watch the sun go down. Our host was quick to respond to communication and flexible on arrival time. Great stay and we will be back!
This is a great place to spend the night especially after a long day of exploring the places nearby. And the view....is breathtaking. Check-in and check-out were simple.
The view from the room is absolutely beautiful. The space is very nicely decorated and comfortable, and the hosts were so friendly. We would like to come back again!
Extremely friendly hosts with amazing views! Would highly recommend!

Two of us came to Central Oregon for one night to run a race in Sisters. Katie and Brooks are outstanding hosts. Brooks greeted us, and both hosts were very easy to communicate with. The space has stellar views of the mountains (though it was overcast during our short visit) and a nice patio and fire pit for watching the sunset. The space has its own garage stall for guests too! Coffee was provided with the option to use a French press or a Keurig. Their restaurant recs were useful (we ate dinner at Worthy Brewing; 👍🏻). We asked to check out 2 hours late, and our gracious hosts allowed it. I would stay again!

The view is great! An adorable and comfortable accommodation. Much better than almost every hotel we've ever stayed at. Fantastic value and warm, welcoming hosts Katie & Brooks. We'll stay again! (The bed is a full-size bed which we are used to but others may not be.)

Katie and Brooks were extremely accommodating to us and their and had some great recommendations for dining and hiking the local area! The sunsets at the Airbnb are unreal and we found ourselves wanting to stay in during the evening just to catch them. We will definitely be coming back soon!

Loved staying at Katie's place while in Bend! The view from bed is stunning and was a pleasure to wake up to, and Katie helpfully left a *ton* of great suggestions on places to dine around Bend. Would definitely stay again.

Katie’s BnB is exactly as shared in her pictures and description. I had a delightful overnight visit with the lovely and comfortable setting and the Mountain View is “the best”!! Katie and Brook are lovely hosts.

Katie’s place was the perfect little vacation spot. Clean, cozy, quiet, and incredible views. Watching the sunset from the room and the patio was fantastic! Close to Bend and easy to find, but far enough away that you are able to enjoy the peace and quiet of the farmland. The home owners were very easy to get in touch with and had great recommendations. We enjoyed a nearby hike along the Deschutes River, and great local food (brewpubs/coffee are plentiful)! Superb location for a relaxing getaway.
Great place to stay. Beautiful location Fantastic hosts.
This place is awesome, perfect little studio setup with beautiful mountain views!

Super responsive & accommodating for their lovely home. Clean, quiet & they suggest the BEST places to eat! The location is perfect for going back & forth to Bend or Sisters. To top it off the views were phenomenal & breathtaking to wake up to! We absolutely loved our stay & plan on staying with them again in the future! Highly recommend!

Katie is such an amazing host - she provides awesome insight into the local restaurants and breweries. The house is situated with beautiful views of the mountains and has everything you need for a comfortable stay. We will definitely be back!
Katie and Brooks are wonderful hosts. The space was so charming and comfortable. I hope I get to visit again.
We loved our stay in this cute and cozy studio. I loved waking up to the amazing view and it was in a great location.

Exactly as presented on the website!
No surprises- simply lovely!!
Would highly recommend.
Mike and Cindy

My girlfriend and I very much enjoyed our stay here. The location was excellent, a short drive to Bend and the mountain. The space was very cozy and has great views on the back patio. It worked out perfectly for us.

This place is very cozy, clean and has a spectacular view! Lovely amenities and great communication. Wonderful location in Tumalo near everything yet has privacy. I would highly recommend.
Jamie
Incredibly gracious hosts, incredible views, and it's in Bend. What else do you need?!
This place is super cute! I wish I could have stayed longer. The view was stunning and the room was quiet and peaceful! Perfect for our one night stay!
This was our second stay and we look forward to more in the future!

A great Airbnb for a weekend trip to Bend. Beautiful rural location on a farm; it was fun to visit their pigs and chickens. Very peaceful location but just 10-15 minutes to downtown Bend.
The only thing to note is there is no shower, only a claw foot bathtub (which is lovely); just worth noting for longer stays.
Perfect and easy in every single way. It was squeaky clean and beautiful. You CANNOT go wrong with this place.
Lovely, cozy, comfortable. We were greeted with a pair of friendly horses in the morning. Highly recommended.

Wonderful, private, peaceful, easy access, clean. Only issue was the tv, navigating the menus was painfully slow and it froze several times to where we had to unplug it to reset. Ideal otherwise though, and we’d be happy to stay again.

It was a pleasure staying at Alex and Tiffany’s property. The place exceeded our expectations: it was even better than described or depicted in the pictures. It’s hard to explain exactly what “at home” feeling is but that’s what we felt staying at their cozy suite.
Highly recommended and will definitely come back!
Thank you.

Peaceful, private, way more space than it seems in the photos and one of the cleaniest airbnbs I've stayed in! The bathroom is very spacious, with a perfect clawfoot tub sitting next to a window. Two sitting rooms: TV sitting room and another sitting room without TV. It's about a 5 to 6 minute drive to restraunts, gas stations, and grocery stores. The host quickly responded to my last-minute booking & was very accommodating!

The place was very nice, and the claw foot bath tub was a super nice addition to the location. It was super secluded in the countryside surrounded by beautiful farmland and livestock! Overall, it was a very nice spot! In our personal experience, we found that one of the lights in the living space that got turned back on after we went to bed, (at about 2:00 Am or so). We were unsure about if there was potentially some miswiring, if any of the lights were on a timer that we didn't know about, or if someone forgot we were staying and came inside the apartment to check on it while we were there.

Our family's stay in Bend was great. Being 15 mins outside of the hustle and bustle of Bend was perfect and the surrounds were lovely. The accomodation was super comfy, although it does take a min to get used to un-orthodox angles to not crack your head. Of particular note is the claw-footed bathtub - so rare to find nowadays!
Highly recommend staying with Alex & Tiffany!

As someone who has always wanted to live in the country, the views from this air bnb were a dream! The horses were right outside the window and you could see them grazing from the bathtub. The bathroom was awesome- I felt like I was at a spa. There is only a portable AC in the living room but the temperature was fine with the windows open at night. There were also plenty of fans and amenities. I would love to come back the next time I’m in the area.
This was our second time staying at Alex and Tiffany’s place. It’s very peaceful and the space is very well put together! It’s a bit smaller, but they have done a great job with the space. Thank you!
Beautiful suite and surroundings. Located about 6 miles outside Bend proper. The bathroom was amazing with vintage style claw foot tub although no shower.
My grown kid and I really enjoyed this place. Very quiet, plenty of space, enjoyed the rural setting but still close enough to town. Loved the tub and luxurious bathroom.

An adult-sized tree house with plenty of possibilities to relax and recharge. Interior is exquisitely crafted with locally-styled materials utilizing every square foot. The bed is comfy and the shareable claw foot tub reigns over the lovely bathroom. Every window offers pasture views and plenty of blue sky. Well-appointed unit has hidden treasures in design and amenities. Thoughtful hand-written notes provide guidelines (battery-operated candles throughout, welcoming breezes, kitchenette use, etc.)
We will certainly be back!!

Place was clean, as described, and well equipped. Price was very reasonable even though there was a big festival in town and lots of folks were gouging. I also appreciate that this place is a great little efficiency and not a full home that could be rented to a local worker in the area.
The claw foot tub was fantastic and the horse neighbors were a lovely bonus. Would stay again and totally recommended for others.
I loved their personal touches that made my stay peaceful and relaxing. It was beautiful to rest, work, and rejuvenate in. I will definitely be booking again when I stay in bend! 😊 Thank you!!

Great little place! Fun layout, nicely arranged and appointed. Loved the horses outside of window and roosters in the morning. Would definitely stay again. A great choice that was perfect for us. With no shower and only a bathtub I miss my morning cold shower a bit. A minor thing. Overall, great!
Great for a quick stop just outside of Bend. Very friendly and helpful host

The huge bathroom was incredible. I enjoyed my relaxing bath with the beautiful view. Others in my party were hoping for a shower option. Have you thought about adding a shower head and brass oval above the tub to hold shower curtain?
Very spacious and clean place. First time in Bend. Great value compared to hotels etc
Clean and comfortable.
Thank you for for creating such a relaxing atmosphere. That bathtub was just what I needed after a long class. What a sweet space y’all have!
Great simple place! quiet and green and has everything you need. Nice bath

We loved our stay! Wonderful home inside and out. The sunset was beautiful from the picnic table right outside the home. The bathtub was great as well! Alex and Tiffany were very responsive whenever we had any questions.
Beautiful place. Very peaceful. Bed was very comfortable. Loved the claw foot tub and theater room !
Great value. Nice, quiet place.
This was such a nice spot just enough outside of town to be quiet but close enough to go do things easily. It was a cute place and the host gave great instructions to get there.

This is my second time back at Alex and Tiffany’s, and it won’t be my last! Great communication, fantastic location, super comfy bed, and their place is SO AWESOME! It was so nice to relax and enjoy my weekend at Bend. They have a DVD player so please stop in at Blockbuster and rent some movies! Thanks for providing a wonderful and safe place for me to stay. Can’t wait to come back!
This is the perfect place to stay if you’re in the bend area! The surrounding are absolutely incredible, it is super private and has a really homey atmosphere! We would 100% stay here again.

Peaceful, comfy place to come home to after exploring Bend, Smith Rock State Park, Newberry National Monument, etc. Thoughtful touches like coffee pods, creamers, and granola bars were appreciated.
Thank you for a lovely stay.
Wow, what an absolutely cute and perfect spot! This spot is so lovely and quiet, perfect for a quick respite. Will definitely stay here again on my next work trip!
Great and fun place to stay in Bend!
Loved our stay at this cute little B&B, very clean, nice furnishings, and very attentive host!

Loved our stay! Very thoughtful decor and helpful reminder signage. It was very clean inside. I especially liked the use of repurposed cheese wheel lids, the tub, and the bath spa products. Reading the other visitors’ visit memos was fun too. The wall heaters kept the space warm, but it was very dry heat. This isn’t so much a review for the hosts but for future visitors - the tv remote doesn’t work well for volume, so turn the volume to where you’d like it on the tv itself BEFORE you play a show or movie!

All the positive; very quiet, relaxing country setting. Alot of thought put into every inch of this add on area to maximize the space. Well done! The accents and touches are very beautiful! The best part was the bed. I'm very picky and this mattress is a dream!
A minor downside is the TV room is only 6 foot tall and I'm 5 ' 11" so no problem there .. but the doorway into the bathroom from the TV room goes alittle more down to below my height. After a couple of bumps (and don't wear a cap!) I quit hitting that area ... but for some reason I couldn't remember to duck when getting into the mini frig.
My main concern was having to take a bath for so many days in a row (7 days) I was well aware it only had a bath and I LOVE baths (great old tub!) ... but a week was just too long without a shower (As l normally wash or at least rinse after baths). I wouldn't of mined taking only a bath for maybe 2 or 3 days.
Also The heating system is just wall heaters that don't connect to a thermostat so it's just impossible to get a nice consentant temp. (I'm a diabetic so I probably get cold easily) And since there's no real air flow from room to room, every room was either too cold or too hot. I was constantly adjusting as I was getting up out of bed several times in the night to go over to the wall heater to either turn it up or down. (But It was no problem the first few days until a cold front came in. I imagine this could be a problem in the summer as well .. and the cow poop will warm up nicely in summer!)
The steps into the bedroom are huge and awkward. In the daytime they are no problem but at night.. Oh my, I had a very hard time maneuvering them when I had to get up half a sleep. (there is a hand rail) And than forgetting that short doorway going into the bathroom...
The bed is up against the wall so a second person will have to work at getting in and out.
Sounds like a lot But overall it was great vibes and great people to deal with. I may go back if it's reasonable priced (no discount for a week) and if it's spring or fall ... for bath only shorter trips.

The cabin was impeccable! Awesome location, we walked all over (including to Hayden Homes Amphitheater) and it was really nice. Loved the decor. Backyard was awesome for our dogs and the layout of the place is super cozy. Would definitely stay again! Keri was also super nice and accomodating, allowing us to check in early and answering questions.
This was a great place to stay and the perfect location. Keri was so nice and very easy to work with. We loved it and will be back.

We enjoyed our stay at this property and appreciated the unique details such as the barn doors to the bedrooms and the garage door to the outside. The cabin was very clean and had all of the amenities that we needed. The location was ideal for accessing the river walking trail, which was a perfect way to start our morning before it got too hot. Communication with the host was great.
The location is amazing-walk out the door to floating, hiking, biking and concerts! Cabin is super sweet and our stay was lovely.
Cute and modern place with a great location. Efficient layout with everything we needed for our small group.
Very nice and tastefully designed cabin in a great location. Dog friendly. Nice and friendly host. Highly recommend!
Keri’s place is exactly as it appears and in a great location in a wonderful city!
The best possible location, warm and welcoming host, and well appointed cabin for our family’s stay. Highly recommend for the ultimate Bend experience!

Great cabin and location! Very clean and tastefully designed cabin. The place is fully equipped for cooking and hanging out. Love the backyard exit to the street to get the the little beach where you can enter the floating river. The location is prime - short drive to restaurants, downtown, Old Mill shopping mall. We had such a wonderful time with our son and his grandparents staying at the place. We will definitely book a stay here at our next visit to Bend.
Great location in Bend, just as advertised. It's in a great location with respect to Old Mill District and enjoying the river. Highly recommend for anyone visiting the area.
We loved this cabin close to all the awesome attractions Bend has to offer. The cabin is clean, cozy and has the best patio / outdoor living you could ask for. We will definitely be back to visit.

The Cabin was the absolute perfect place to stay in Bend! The inside is extremely well done and we loved all of the barn doors and small details. The location also cannot be beat, it was within walking distance of so much.
Me and my dog loved our stay here! The cabin is cute, cozy, and very clean. Communication was quick and excellent. We will stay again.
Great place to stay & very close to the river.
We really enjoyed our stay!! The cabin is beautiful, and very clean. The location couldn’t be better. We would definitely recommend!

This place is amazing, very comfortable and in a great easy to find location. Right across the street from a park on the river, with a 15 minute walk to the old mill. Bend is a beautiful town and this place only makes it better. We will be back! next time with bicycles!
The perfect place to stay by the river and Old Mill district. Comfortable and beautiful with a great outdoor space. Highly recommend
Perfect location. Step out the door to the river trail. Close to hiking, breweries and restaurants. Wonderful

Keri’s place is perfect. It’s a super standalone unit that’s really nicely kitted out and the fenced yard was perfect for our dog.
The proximity to the Deschutes River for a stroll to the Old Mil for morning coffee or a walk to the south is the highlight of the location.
Highly recommended and would happily stay here again.
Wonderful cabin and host!
We loved our stay and recommend it.

Too many clever design uses of reclaimed building materials to count, that's my "complaint", so hope to be going back to stay longer and see what all I missed during the first stay. Super helpful host and a comfy secluded little hideaway for work or play.

What a delightful spot near the Old Mill district of Bend. Amazing location by the river with the river walk and a playground close by. It was the perfect place for our family of 3 to relax and explore the area from. Would love to return some day!
Great location for walking along the river with easy, close access. Good use of space, comfortable bed and lounging space. Dogs were happy with the fenced backyard. We'll be back!
Keri’s spot was perfect, close to the river, very well maintained and had a cool vibe with the garage door opening to the backyard. I adjusted my stay no problem. Would 100% recommend and stay again.
This was a perfect home base for our weekend stay in Bend. Lots of space, friendly host. The beds were really comfy and we enjoyed hanging out on the back porch with the gas fire pit.
This house is great! The decor and space is so cozy yet spacious. We only stayed one night but really enjoyed it. The bed I slept in was extremely comfortable.

Very cool cabin. Rustic yet modern with everything you need provided. The garage door that opens to the backyard is an awesome feature. It was a little cold when I was there but I still couldn't resist trying it out. The neighborhood is nice with a park entrance to the river, just down the block. Our host was friendly and communicative. Thanks Keri!
Super cool place and a great location!

We stayed at Keri’s place for three nights and had a perfect experience. The cabin is modern and perfect in every way. Exceptionally clean, very well equipped kitchen space with everything needed, comfortable beds, wonderful stone shower, and love the glass roll up garage door. The location is fantastic, we walked the short distance to Old Mill shops, restaurants and breweries, and the park along the River is just out the back door. Keri was very responsive and I would absolutely rent this cabin again next time we go to Bend. Thanks Keri!

This is a great getaway, the house is very unique - plenty of space and light, the design is very cool, private backyard with access to walking trails, a view of the cliffs next to the river. Highly recommend this place for your next trip to Bend!!

Had a wonderful stay! Plenty of room for our larger dogs to run around in the yard, plenty of space for a small family or group, too. It was just two of us but we felt right at home! Proximity to shops, restaurants and outdoor activities cannot be beat! Just walk out the backyard and you’re on to a new adventure! A nice quiet neighborhood with friendly people. Highly recommend staying!!
Awesome location in Bend right across the street from the river trails. Perfect amount of space, close to everything, will definitely be back!

Keri’s cabin is great! Amazing location. Right next to the river and a great little beach. Trails in walking distance. Old Mill District has a ton of great breweries and places to eat. Highly recommend!
Clean, well-appointed cabin in a great location in Bend!

A great stay in a perfect location. Close to downtown, 20 minutes form the mountain and surrounded by walkable trails. Very cool house and an awesome stay for cozy friend groups or a couple with a pup!
Great location, lovely home. Highly recommend.

The photos truly don’t do this bnb justice! Beautiful vaulted ceilings, cute backyard, amazingly soft sheets, and just a comfy vibe. Keri was quick to respond to the few times I messaged her and was obviously very attentive to making sure we would enjoy our time there.
This is our 2nd time staying at Keri's place. This place is always amazing and very convenient to everywhere in town.

This place was great and I loved that we could bring the dogs! I found the location to be awesome, very walkable distance to town as well as the trails.
I prefer more bathroom privacy (barn door separating bathroom from bedroom) but that’s just me, otherwise perfect, cute space!
This is our second time staying here and it won’t be our last! Great location, comfortable beds, and all the amenities.
What an incredible place! Excellent location, communicative host, wonderfully setup cabin! A+
Great location! Quick jump to Century which goes straight to Bachelor. The cabin is beautiful , great view out back window and fantastic amenities. Highly recommend to all.

Awesome location.
Super responsive and friendly.

Beautiful home, perfect location, very clean. Walking distance from many places, quiet neighborhood. Keri was very communicative and helpful. The cabin is amazing! Great location for everything to do in Bend! We can’t wait to stay again!
Highly recommend great place to stay if you are visiting Bend.

Brooks and Katie were incredible hosts. This was our first time staying in an Airbnb and they set the bar high. We were on a road trip before our first baby arrives, stopping in towns that caught our attention. Brooks and Katie were welcoming and warm. They suggested a fun brewery/observatory with a Beatles cover band playing and we had so much fun that night. We also ate at Katie’s favorite breakfast spot and had such a fulfilling meal. The room was so bright and cheerful, beautifully decorated. It far surpassed a stay at a generic hotel. They were so helpful about finding things in the area and easy to talk with. Hopefully one day we’ll make the trip again as a family of three and get to stay in this cute studio again.
